name: CVPlanarPixelBufferInfo_YCbCrBiPlanar
desc: A structure for describing YCbCr biplanar buffers.

items.name: var componentInfoCbCr: CVPlanarComponentInfo
items.desc: A CVPlanarComponentInfo structure containing information on the Cb/Cr component of the buffer.

items.name: var componentInfoY: CVPlanarComponentInfo
items.desc: A CVPlanarComponentInfo structure containing information on the Y component of the buffer.
